name: KATHMANDU CASINO
shortDescription: A casino-style card game, likely a variation of 3-card poker or Teen Patti, featuring multiple modes and in-game chip purchases.
fullDescription:
KATHMANDU CASINO is a multi-game card application centered around a competitive 3-card game (similar to Teen Patti or 3 Card Poker). The game operates on a chip/token currency system, offering a welcome bonus of $15,240 tokens and multiple purchase options for chips. Players compete at virtual tables with a shared pot.

Key Features:

  • Competitive Card Gameplay: Features standard hand rankings (3 of a Kind, Flush, Run) for strategic play.
  • In-Game Currency: Utilizes 'Tokens' or 'Chips' for betting, with a generous welcome bonus and purchase options.
  • Multiplayer Tables: Compete with other players at virtual tables with betting functionality and a shared pot.
  • Expanding Library: Future game modes like 'JHAAP' and 'MURDER' are planned to be added.
